items.sentence: Tom told me you were looking for a babysitter.
This is the first time that this has happened.
Tom is married to a Canadian woman named Mary.
Tom wished that their kiss would last forever.
Tom called and asked how everything was going.
I know the reason why Tom was angry with them.
Tom is the only one of us who isn\'t Canadian.
Tom is convinced that Mary stole his clarinet.
Tom is going to try to do that this afternoon.
How would you feel if someone did that to you?
